name: Raining Money: Catch That Cash
description:
Haven’t we all dreamed of there being an unlimited money supply and being tasked with grabbing as much cash as possible?

While that scenario may be unlikely in real life, this new action packed app is Raining Money and challenges players of all ages to do just that: CATCH THAT CASH!

• Price: Free for a limited time, then $.99
• Compatibility: iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch. Requires iOS 5.0 or later
• HD graphics and custom music

Please leave us a review or send feedback through our support site. Thanks,

Mobixia


***************************************

The story... you are getting ready to go in the bank and all of the sudden it explodes!

In a great and glorious fashion, money starts raining from sky. Catch the Cash as it rains down!

You will have hours of fun swiping up all the cash. For the Love of Money it's time to Make it Rain! Get that Money! Enjoy
